attributes.review: It took forever tk download on my phone. It made my phone get viruses and turned off my phone and my phone wouldnt turn back on. So i took it to the apple store and they fixed it. They took out the viruses and turned my phone back on
attributes.title: Bad App

attributes.review: It takes so long and it crashes your phone and give virus don’t download it unless you want to make your phone break and it took more than 5 hours to install would not recommend
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: it took several days to download then once it did it never worked so i restarted my phone thinking something was wrong and then it asked for my phone number which i find inappropriate. don’t get this app.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: so i went to download this app to get a more informed view and then it happen. my phone was turning on and off and then this picture appeared on my phone and it was of trump and it would not go away until i un-downloaded the app. never download it!!!
attributes.title: ONLY DOWNLOAD IF YOU WANT YOUR PHONE TO GLITCH

attributes.review: This app is terrible. it took almost 28 years to download. Which isn’t a great start..then when it finally did download, i got a call from the government saying if i didn’t vote trump they would kidnap my family and take down tik tok. So, i do not recommend.

The app took forever to download and is super complicated that I don’t even know how to use it. Plus it hacked all of my personal information, including my number and now I got a bunch of spam messages. Wish I could give it 0 stars!
attributes.title: AWFUL!!!

attributes.review: Hated the app got on to it and it crashed my phone immediately, and all Verizon stores were closed due to covid so I have to wait a month before taking it into the store and then turns out all my information went to China !!!!!!! Tik tok wouldve never done this to me 😡. Hated the trump app
attributes.title: Sir no

attributes.review: This is quite literally the worst app I’ve ever used. It took 10 years to download and than it didn’t even work until 50 years later. It makes my phone lag and the quality is terrible.
This app made my phone crash so many times. I think it has a virus or something. It also sent messages to me without my consent. Don’t allow this app to continue until the bugs are fixed.
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: The app is very glitchy and made my screen freeze! I got stuck with a horrible experience for almost 4 years and it won’t delete no matter how hard I try. I would give this 0 stars if I could!!!
attributes.title: Broke My Phone!!!
